name: Myrryrd (Mirrored) Demo
description:
Controls:

Arrows keys move the player(s).

"S" key skips to next level

Objective:

Guide both player sprites into the blue goals simultaneously...

MYRRYRD

A game I've been working on for the past couple days... Still in early pre-alpha stages... Any support, whether monetary or feedback, will be greatly appreciated and will help immensely with future development of this and other games...

The "Choose Level" Menu is not working right now... Will be in next version... High score tables for each level will be sometime soon, possibly next version as well...
